Since yesterday, Tri An hydropower plant,
the largest hydropower plant in the South in Vinh Cuu district,
Dong Nai province, has conducted flood discharge to
regulate the reservoir after water flow from
upstream has increased rapidly in
recent days. This is to ensure  Hydroelectric reservoir safety
maintains the reservoir water level according to
regulations. The total water flow discharged into Ha
Du is 965 m2 per second, of which the
water flow through the reservoir is 165 m2 per second
after discharge depending on the weather situation.  According to the
situation and water flow to the reservoir, Tri An Electric City Company
can change the amount of water
released through the dam in response to this situation.
People in the Lower Reservoir area, including the
low-lying areas along the Dong Nai River in
Binh Duong, Dong Nai and  Ho Chi
Minh City needs to proactively take preventive measures
to avoid possible damage
due to
high river levels. Ladies and gentlemen, recently

most recent rains on October 29,
after prolonged rain and high tide,
this Chu was flooded when the wheels of some

pass.  People had to walk due to
previous vehicle damage. At some times, the
Tan Tao underpass was also flooded in Lang, according to
records on October 23, although the rain had
stopped for a long time, but in both directions, the
underpass was still flooded.  The
main cause of the flooding of the Tan Tao underground tunnel is due to
prolonged heavy rain, the station's four pumps did
not work in time. At the same time, when pumping into the
above drainage system, the road traffic infrastructure management center under the Department of Transport  Highway 1
was also flooded at that time so the water could not drain completely.
Currently, the Center has installed a

arranged additional pumps and mobile generators
to respond to emergency flooding in
the areas.  The Tan Tao Underground Tunnel project was put into

mecon with the guidance of the

a personal nurse to help decode and process
all information on prescriptions for the
user with just a dozen prescriptions.
From the information obtained,
this application will enter into the system the
daily diagnosis, drug name, dosage
and usage according to instructions. Through this, the app will
create a separate daily medication schedule
for each user and remind them.
What the team aims to do
when developing this application
is to help patients have more
information about what they are
taking, as well as the role of medication
during the process.  They
still have certain difficulties such as
the high cost of purchasing a server to process and

our application can
only recognize Vietnamese prescriptions.
We are more ambitious than we
hope to be able to identify many
prescriptions in many formats and
languages. The application has received a

in the latest reaction. Ban said he will

in most cases the

USD and 1.25 million  US dollars in two

Lawsuits related to Rup products have
dogged B since the acquisition of
Monsanto in 2018. Up to now, the company still
faces nearly 40,000 related lawsuits.
Hundreds of thousands of Filipinos
gathered in sprawling cemeteries in the
capital Manila on Wednesday, camping at
graves or praying before the
final resting place of relatives or
friends on the occasion of All Saints' Day.
Mostly Catholic Southeast Asian country, All Souls'
Day
is marked by
bringing candles and food to
cemeteries. She's been gone for 9 years, but
we still keep visiting her.  This
gives the feeling that she is here and is with
us because we love him
very much. And this is our way of
showing that he is important and that we
have not forgotten him. However, due to inflation, the
year  Today Even a simple bunch of candles is

tradition will no longer be as grand
as before with so many candles and candles. In the

when people can go to the crematorium.  graves

's Art career spanning more than 65 years

wanted to express his imagination
through his deepest thoughts and feelings. The

even

not only of the demon class but also the
realities of an entire society.  Spanish society

everything else in such a brutal and realistic way
that we can completely
compare it to what is happening in
the wars going on today.
The exhibition is the result of cooperation between
